title: Nikola Djurek
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018015925/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018015925/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Nikola Djurek**

Croatian type designer and graduate of [KABK](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018015925/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Royal%20Academy%20of%20Art), Djurek is also [ATypI](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018015925/http:/typophile.com/wiki/ATypI) Country Delegate for Croatia.

**Typefaces**  
 [OT Amalia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018015925/http:/typonine.com/typo9/index.php?n=Typonine.Amalia)

**External Links**  
 [typonine](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018015925/http:/typonine.com/)

author: Co
